hero.description: Individual sessions, courses, and corporate programs to enhance focus, well-being, and productivity.

description.line1: Access Bars is a subtle and relaxing technique that involves touching 32 energetic points on the head.
description.line2: Each point (or 'bar') is connected to aspects of our life—such as creativity, joy, money, control, among others.
description.line3: By activating these 'bars', it is possible to release blockages, limiting beliefs, and tensions that prevent us from living more expansively and balanced.

benefits.title: Why have an Access Bars session?
benefits.item1: Relieves stress and anxiety, promoting deep relaxation.
benefits.item2: Enhances mental clarity and emotional balance to face daily challenges.
benefits.item3: Improves sleep quality and provides a prolonged sense of well-being.

study.title: Access Bars with Scientific Evidence
study.analysis: Analysis of what happens in the brain before and after an Access Bars session, presented by Neuroscientist Dr. Jeffrey Fannin. Filmed in March 2015, in San Diego, California.
study.observations: Studies conducted with EEG measurements demonstrated significant changes in brain activity right after a session. With over 16 years of experience, it was observed that regions with high activity returned to normal levels immediately after the procedure — something rarely seen in such a short time.
study.conclusion: This evidence reinforces the method’s effectiveness in promoting well-being and unlocking your potential. If you’re seeking a transformative approach, Access Bars may be the ideal choice.

individualSection.title: Individual Sessions
individualSection.subtitle2: Experience a transformative session in the comfort of your home or at Manon Ruivo’s welcoming space.
individualSection.subtitle3: A step towards greater well-being and balance.
individualSection.introText1: In an individual Access Bars® session, gentle touches on 32 energetic points on the head help release blockages, beliefs, and accumulated tensions.
individualSection.introText2: Each session lasts about 60 minutes, providing immediate stress relief and a profound sense of well-being.

listItems.item4: Lack of clarity and mental balance

corporateSection.title: On-Site Service in Companies
corporateSection.paragraph: Bring the benefits of Access Bars® directly to your corporate environment. Promote well-being, focus, and productivity among employees, reducing stress and fostering a lighter, more collaborative organizational climate.

list.item1: Reduced stress and anxiety in daily work
list.item2: Increased focus and productivity in teams
list.item4: Enhanced employee appreciation and reduced absenteeism

corporateSection.button: Implement Access Bars in My Company

courseSection.title: Access Bars® Training
courseSection.intro1: Learn how to apply the technique that has been transforming lives worldwide.
courseSection.intro2: Develop the skills to conduct sessions and help people release blockages, beliefs, and tensions, promoting well-being and balance.

blog.subtitle2: Innovation and trends that connect ideas

testimonial.title: Testimonial
testimonial.writtenTextTatiana: Receiving Access Bars is like hitting the 'reset' button on the mind. It brings a sense of relief, clarity, and lightness that naturally sets in. Over the sessions, I noticed my worries diminished, my mind became calmer, and I started seeing new possibilities for my life. It's as if limiting thoughts lose their strength, making room for greater ease, joy, and lightness in everyday life. I recommend it to anyone who wants to feel freer and expand their consciousness!
testimonial.writtenTextRenato: Good afternoon, my name is Renato Rivelles, and I'm here to share with you and write about my first experience with Access Bars, which was with Manon Ruivo. I arranged the session, went to the agreed location without any prior knowledge and with zero expectations. I underwent the procedure, which lasted about an hour, and Manon instructed me to observe any changes in my thoughts or behavior, and so it happened. I left feeling relaxed, with a very pleasant and intense relaxation that same night, and something very interesting also happened. I began recalling certain people, and each time I remembered someone, words came to mind that I should have said to them—exactly what I should have said. This gave me enormous satisfaction. There was a moment almost like a dream, and on another day something very interesting occurred. I was in front of the television, watching a show, and while having a caipirinha, I started stretching along with the phrases on TV and realized that my expressiveness was much greater than usual. I was very animated, even stuttering at one point, saying, 'this can't be possible, this person!' And then, the next day, I woke up with a strong desire to talk to people I hadn't spoken to in a long time. I didn't stop talking with my daily contacts, but I reached out to those I hadn't spoken to in years. Interestingly, the responses were very positive, as if I had spoken with them just the day before. It was wonderful. I called about four people and felt an amazing sensation. After that, I rushed to Manon to share my experiences and scheduled a second Access Bars session. I haven't researched this technique yet, but I am living proof that it truly generates all these positive sensations, and I highly recommend it. If you're interested, it's well worth it. Goodbye, and good luck.

about.title: About Manon
about.paragraph1: I’m Manon Ruivo, and since childhood I have been curious—always seeking to understand the reasons behind everything around me and drawn to spirituality.
about.paragraph2: I lived in many different places due to my father’s work, met many people, and experienced various religions.
about.paragraph3: I faced many challenges, and one of the most intense moments took me to rock bottom when I decided to ask for change.
about.paragraph4: It took 6 years of preparation, learning, and deep study until I got to know myself enough to love who I am, understand my essence and mission.
about.paragraph5: Access Consciousness allowed me to access my consciousness, and I choose to help you, through Access Bars, unlock infinite possibilities—breaking free from autopilot to live with more freedom, lightness, and joy.

cta.title: Get in Touch
cta.copy1: Ready to take the next step?
cta.copy2: Schedule your session and discover a world of possibilities.
